HEADLINE: ABB India Ltd has submitted to BSE a copy of the transcript of conference call with analysts, which took place on November 03, 2015, after the announcement of Q3 2015 unaudited financial results of the Company. The said transcript is also uploaded on the Company’s website.

ABB India Ltd has submitted to BSE a copy of the transcript of conference call with analysts, which took place on July 24, 2015, after the announcement of Q2 2015 unaudited financial results of the Company. The said transcript is also uploaded on the Company’s website.

ABB India Ltd has submitted to BSE a copy of the transcript of conference call with analysts, which took place on February 10, 2015, after the announcement of Q4 2014 and annual audited financial results for the year 2014 of the Company. The said transcript is also uploaded on the Company’s website.
